entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is impressed by Harry's potions skills.

entities.name: prince
entities.description: The Prince who invented the spells and jinxes in the book.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who was targeted by Harry's spell.

entities.name: argus filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who was targeted by Harry's jinx.

relationships.description: Slughorn is impressed by Harry's potions skills.
Harry was influenced by the Prince's spells and jinxes in the book.
Harry targeted Crabbe with one of the Prince's spells.
Harry targeted Argus Filch with one of the Prince's jinxes.
The Prince influenced Harry by inventing spells and jinxes in the book.
Slughorn is impressed by Harry's potions skills.
